name: Torgar's Quest
description:
Torgar is 4th in line to rule the Splitbeard clan of dwarves. He is also kind of crazy. These are the reasons, he decided to pack a lunch and nothing else, before heading into the long abandoned Deepgold Mine, looking for the shards of an artifact that will give Torgar ultimate power - The Mastery Crystal!

  • Turn-based adventuring!
  • Find 7 crystal shards to WIN!
  • Permadeath. No SAVE!
  • Procedural dungeons. Every level is different.
  • Upgrade weapons and armor as you go.
  • Uncover lore.
  • Find food and potions to stay alive.
  • Break things and find secret treasure!
  • Learn special abilities, as Torgar levels up.

Too easy? Try hard or nightmare setting.
